title: I’m Cinderella’s Sister, but I’m Reluctantly Going to Marry the Prince - Novel Updates
tags: Comedic Undertone   Female Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Nobles   Oneshot
author: Yuzu Lemon   柚子れもん
description:
When the prince arrives with a glass slipper in his hand, Cinderella elopes with the wizard right in front of him!
The prince couldn't go back to the castle empty-handed and decided to take Cinderella's not-mean step-sister and marry her.

This is the story of Cinderella's step-sister, who has neither glass slippers nor a pumpkin carriage, who reluctantly ends up marrying the prince, and how she finds her own happiness.>
